pageContent: Background: The authors of this study previously evaluated pelvic irradiation-induced late side effects in patients with localized prostatic carcinoma 4 years after external irradiation by administering a validated self-assessment questionnaire (QUFW94), and compared the results with those of age-matched controls. The current study was designed to evaluate prospectively the patients' problems 8 years after radiotherapy and to compare them with those reported by the same controls.

metaData.source:
Anatomic and technical considerations for optimizing recovery of sexual function during robotic-assisted radical prostatectomy
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/23169152/
